amendment.description: Amendment limits the number of Federal employees that are sent to international conferences funded under this bill to 50.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 Federal employees from the agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
